title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for red, black and brown applied over resist. Some areas of red mordant applied by pen. Madder dyed. Blue applied by brush over resist (chintz).
description: Curving vines with exotic blossoms. Band of red at bottom. Outline for shapes visible.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for red, black and brown applied over resist. Some areas of red mordant applied by pen. Madder dyed. Blue applied by brush over resist (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-41.
